info.title: Merchandise Category (A2X)
info.description:
This service enables you to create, read, update, and delete merchandise category data. It includes merchandise 
category description, assignment of characteristic to merchandise category, assignment of merchandise category to merchandise category hierarchy node, and characteristic value restriction

x-sap-shortText: Create and maintain merchandise category data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: RFM - Merchandise Category and Merchandise Category Hierarchy Node Integration(SAP_COM_0799)
